name: BIOwerk Mesh Demo Assets
description: Sanitized sample assets that mirror document, sheet, and slide workloads for Mesh agents.

workloads.expected_use: Feed to osteon draft/edit/summarize endpoints to build the executive brief.
workloads.expected_output: A structured outline and refined draft with provenance hashes returned by osteon.

workloads.expected_use: Pass to myocyte ingest_table for metric analysis and anomaly spotting.
workloads.expected_output: Normalized tables suitable for downstream visualization and governance export.

workloads.expected_use: Provide as context to synapse storyboard or slide-generation routes.
workloads.expected_output: Slide outlines and visual recommendations keyed to the sanitized launch review narrative.
